Title: Eyes Wide Shut
Writer: Stanley Kubrick (screenplay), Frederic Raphael (screenplay), Arthur Schnitzler (inspired by "Traumnovelle" by)
Actors: Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Madison Eginton, Jackie Sawiris
Plot: A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife reveals a painful secret to him.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 8 wins & 26 nominations.
